# 1991 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1991 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1992 for the 1991 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1991 are as follows.
